name: What Keeps Us Apart
description:
If you love Dragon Age and especially the character of Cullen Rutherford, you might enjoy this game.
It was made with Twine (Harlowe) and only takes a few minutes to play. 
I would love to improve and create a sequel - constructive feedback is welcome! (Twitter: @XPaele)

Content
This short fanfiction is set before the start of the mage origin in the video game Dragon Age: Origins in the Circle of Magi in Ferelden.
It contains young Cullen Rutherford's crush on a female mage (Amell/Surana), from Cullen's perspective (2nd person POV). 
There is no sexually explicit content but very mild descriptions of violence/horror.

I do not own any content that is related to Dragon Age - the world and the characters are owned by Bioware/EA.
I only made this for fun and because I love this franchise - I do not intend to make money off of it.
If there is any reason for me to delete this, please let me know.

Quality
English is not my first language - please keep that in mind while reading.
I am also not an experienced writer or game designer whatsoever.
This is my first game and I made it mostly for myself.
I'm glad if you try it out and maybe have some fun, too - but please don't expect too much.
